mapper.select: select t2."user_id" "userId" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_user_mapper" t1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_user" t2 on t1."user_id" = t2."user_id" where t1."type"='IP' and t1."type_id" = #{id}
select "longitude","latitude" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_pubipaddress_table" where "link_id"=#{id}
select t2."org_id" "orgId" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_org_mapper" t1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_org" t2 on t1."org_id" = t2."org_id" where t1."type"='IP' and t1."type_id" = #{id}

select "nodes" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_org" where "org_id" in
#{item.value}
select t1."group_id" "groupId" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_group_mapper" t1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_group_table" t2 on t1."group_id" = t2."group_id" where t1."type"='IP' and t1."type_id" = #{id}

select t1."label_id" "labelId" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ip_label_link_mapper" t1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_labelmanage_table" t2 on t1."label_id" = t2."label_id" where t2."delete_flag"= 0 and t1."link_id" = #{id}

select t2."user_id" "userId", t2."login_name" "loginName", t2."user_name" "userName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_user_mapper" t1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_user" t2 on t1."user_id" = t2."user_id" where t1."type"='IP' and t1."type_id" = #{id}

select t2."org_id" "orgId", t2."org_name" "orgName", t2."nodes" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_org_mapper" t1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_org" t2 on t1."org_id" = t2."org_id" where t1."type"='IP' and t1."type_id" = #{id}

select t1."group_id" "groupId", t2."group_name" "groupName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_group_mapper" t1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_group_table" t2 on t1."group_id" = t2."group_id" where t1."type"='IP' and t1."type_id" = #{id}

select t1."label_id" "labelId", t2."label_name" "labelName" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ip_label_link_mapper" t1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_labelmanage_table" t2 on t1."label_id" = t2."label_id" where t2."delete_flag"= 0 and t1."link_id" = #{id}
select * from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanage_table" where "parent_id" = #{id}

select from ( select
from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanage_table" a1 where a1."parent_id" = #{parentId} ) a2
left join (select "type_id","org_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_org_mapper" where type='IP') t2 ON a2."id" = t2.type_id where "org_id" in
#{item.value}
order by case when "type"='grouping' then 0 else 1 end, "type" asc, case when "type"='grouping' then "create_date" end desc

select
from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanage_table" a1 left join ${TBSNAME}."mw_datapermission" a4 ON a1."id" = a4."type_id" and a1."parent_id" = #{parentId} left join (select "type_id","user_id" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_user_mapper" where "type"='IP') a5 ON a1."id" = a5."type_id" where a4."is_user" = 1 and a5."user_id" = #{userId}
order by case when "type"='grouping' then 0 else 1 end, "type" asc, case when "type"='grouping' then "create_date" end desc
order by case when a1."type"='grouping' then 0 else 1 end, "type" asc, case when a1."type"='grouping' then "create_date" end desc
mapper.insert:
select ${TBSNAME}.SEQ_CUSTOMCOL_TABLE.NEXTVAL as "id" from DUAL
insert into "mw_ipaddressmanage_table"
"id", "timing", "parent_id", "label", "type", "leaf", "is_include", "descri", "mask", "ip_addresses", "creator", "create_date", "modifier", "modification_date", "country", "state", "city", "region", "address_desc", "longitude", "latitude", "radio_status", "create_ip", "signId"
VALUES ( #{id}, #{timing}, #{parentId}, #{label}, #{type}, #{leaf}, #{include}, #{descri}, #{mask}, #{ipAddresses}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{modifier}, #{modificationDate}, #{country}, #{state}, #{city}, #{region}, #{addressDesc}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{radioStatus}, #{createIp}, signId )
mapper.select:
select * from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanage_table" where "id" in
#{item.value}
mapper.insert:
INSERT All
into "mw_pubipaddress_table" ("id","link_id","ip_address","ip_type","country","state","city","region","isp","longitude","latitude" )values
( null, #{item.linkId}, #{item.ipAddress}, #{item.ipType}, #{item.country}, #{item.state}, #{item.city}, #{item.region}, #{item.isp}, #{item.longitude}, #{item.latitude} )
SELECT 1 from dual
mapper.select: select * from ${TBSNAME}."mw_pubipaddress_table"
select * from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanage_table" where "longitude" is not null and "latitude" is not null AND "longitude" !='' and "latitude" !=''
select count(*) from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanage_table" where "parent_id"=#{id} and "type" ='grouping'
SELECT * FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_ip_connection" where "ip_address" =#{ipAddress} AND "oper_status" = 0

SELECT * FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_ip_connection" where 1=1
and "ip_address" in
#{item.ip}
and "ip_address" ='-1'
order by "oper_time" desc

SELECT distinct t1."org_name" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_org_mapper" t RIGHT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_org" t1 ON t."org_id" = t1."org_id" WHERE t1."delete_flag"=0 AND t."type" = 'IP' AND t."type_id" in ( SELECT "link_id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" WHERE "ip_address" = #{ip} )

SELECT distinct t1."org_name" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_org_mapper" t RIGHT JOIN ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_org" t1 ON t."org_id" = t1."org_id" WHERE t1."delete_flag"=0 AND t."type" = 'IPV6' AND t."type_id" in ( SELECT "link_id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipv6managelist_table" WHERE "ip_address" = #{ip} )

SELECT "org_name" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_sys_org" WHERE "org_id" IN ( SELECT "org_id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_org_mapper" WHERE "type_id" IN ( SELECT "id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanage_table" WHERE "id" = ( SELECT "link_id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" WHERE "ip_address" IN ( #{ip} )) UNION ALL SELECT "id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipv6manage_table" WHERE "id" = ( SELECT "link_id" FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipv6managelist_table" WHERE "ip_address" IN ( #{ip} )) ) AND "type" IN ( 'IP', 'IPV6' ) )

select count(*) as "no_use" from "mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" where "link_id"= #{id} and "ip_state"=0 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=0 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=255 union all select count(*) as "used" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" where "link_id"= #{id} and "ip_state"=1 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=0 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=255 union all select count(*) as "reserve" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" where "link_id"= #{id} and "ip_state"=2 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=0 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=255 union all select count(*) as "on_line" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" where "link_id"= #{id} and "online"=1 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=0 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=255 union all select count(*) as "off_line" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" where "link_id"= #{id} and "online"=0 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=0 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=255 union all select count(*) as "off_line" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" where "link_id"= #{id} and "assets_type"='已知' AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=0 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=255 union all select count(*) as "off_line" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" where "link_id"= #{id} and ("assets_type" is NULL OR "assets_type" !='已知') AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=0 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=255 union all select count(*) as "off_line" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" where "link_id"= #{id} and "distribution_status"=0 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=0 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=255 union all select count(*) as "off_line" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" where "link_id"= #{id} and "distribution_status"=1 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=0 AND SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)!=255 union all select count(*) as "off_line" from ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" where (SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)=0 or SUBSTR("ip_address",INSTR("ip_address",'.',-1)+1)=255) and "link_id"= #{id}
SELECT count(*) FROM "mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table"

SELECT * FROM "mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" WHERE "link_id" in ( SELECT "id" FROM "mw_ipaddressmanage_table" WHERE mask-"255.255.255.0" and "id" not in ( SELECT "link_id" FROM "mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" WHERE "ip_address" like '%.255' ) AND type = 'iPaddresses' ) GROUP BY "link_id"
SELECT label,id AS "value" FROM "mw_ipaddressmanage_table" where type = "iPaddresses"
select count(*) from "mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" where "link_id" = #{id} and "distribution_status" = 1
SELECT * FROM "mw_ipaddressmanagelist_table" a1 WHERE "link_id" =#{id} AND a1."is_include" = true

SELECT * FROM ${TBSNAME}."mw_ipaddress_status_his" where 1=1 and "old_assets_name" like '%'||#{oldAssetsName}||'%' and "old_mac" like '%'||#{oldMac}||'%' and "old_remarks" like '%'||#{oldRemarks}||'%' and "assets_name" like '%'||#{assetsName}||'%' and "mac" like '%'||#{mac}||'%' and "remarks" like '%'||#{remarks}||'%' and "ip_address" like '%'||#{ipAddress}||'%' and "creator" like '%'||#{creator}||'%' ORDER BY "create_date" desc
